Scenario: An unidentified missile has been detected on radar, approaching the fleet at high speed. Its trajectory indicates a possible direct impact. All defense systems must be activated immediately to intercept the threat.
Hard Constraints: Capability; Speed; Fuel; Spares availability; Balancing loads; Workshop availability
Soft Constraints: Fleet availability; Manpower availability; Logistic time

Scenario: A sailor has fallen overboard during rough weather conditions, with the ship traveling at high speed. Immediate recovery measures are essential to save the individual's life.
Task Objective: Interrogation and interception; Missile firing; Maintenance scheduling
Objective function: Minimum risk; Minimum time; Maximum reliability; Minimum downtime
Hard Constraints: Capability; Ration; Fuel; Risk score; Workshop availability
Soft Constraints: Fleet availability; Manpower availability; Logistic time
